data.title: Agnisnan

data.text:
2021

9401 mins

all age

351

Agnisnaan is a 1985 Assamese language drama film directed by Bhabendra Nath Saikia. The film is based on Saikia's novel titled Antareep. The film starred Indra Bania, Kashmiri Barua, Chetana Das, Ashok Deka, Moloya Goswami, Arjun Guha Thakuria, Arun Nath and Biju Phukan.

Directors : N/A

Genres : Drama

Audio Language : Assamese
